name: Gun Gal
description:
First game hopefully not the last.

Credits to the author of the font, Fontname:Alabard (The pixel art gothic Font)

I have not written a lore for the game, asi is my fisrt i was just testing stuff but.

I like to imagine our protagonist is fighting some unusual demons, maybe an invasion, the little flying ghosts are minions of a much bigger demon the general or maybe even the "Overlord?", the little possesed tanks or werid gun things are the fodder (Possesed tecnology to give form to their spirit idfk), the big pop guy is a high demon (Denoted by it's ability to jump and shoot fast lol), the sphere is what i imagine the poop guy leaves after dying having no direction but still hurts to touch.

There are some power uos in there, one that lets you jump higher, on to be faster, one to shoot faster and health, mos bevome useless after a point (you become op) but they give score.

The controls are:

W: Jump

A:  Left

D:  Right

U:  Unstuck

T: Regain Health

N: ?

Good Luck, Have Fun.
